items.title: Enforce page boundaries - remove workshop duplication from homepage
items.description: Architectural refactor to enforce page responsibility boundaries. Homepage reduced to positioning + routing only (5-6 sections). Workshop content relocated to /workshops. Systems Overview section replaces workshop cards. TrustBar copy updated to be system-focused. Implements rule: if section explains 'what happens when', it cannot live on homepage.

items.title: Update /literate definition section copy
items.description: Replace definition section copy on /literate page with new artifact-focused messaging. Surgical swap of i18n content only - no layout or component changes.

items.title: Remove unscoped protocol page
items.description: Remove the /protocol page as the offering has not been fully scoped. The page was using an outdated 'Workshop Authority' design system instead of the current 'Editorial Noir Institutional Perfection' theme. Rather than fix styling for an unready feature, remove it entirely. ADRs and i18n content preserved for future reference.

items.title: Create /build page for ŚavvyBuild
items.description: Implement the /build page for ŚavvyBuild - custom AI program design and delivery offering. Premium, application-required positioning with 5 sections: BUILD (hero), SCOPE (what we build), FIT (audience), PROOF (testimonials placeholder), APPLY (CTA to /#book).

items.title: Three-page AI Literate architecture refactor
items.description: Refactor AI Literate from single page to three-page architecture: /workshops (directory, transactional), /literate (system IP explanation), /partners (B2B partnership conversion). Implements separation of jobs principle. Includes 301 redirect from /workshops/ai-literate to /literate.
